messages.subject: Any unschoolers in the Ojai, Ventura Ca. area?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, We are looking into the possibility of moving to Ojai, Ca. I was wondering if there are any unschoolers there.  My boy will turn 13 in a few days and we
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
We are looking into the possibility of moving to Ojai, Ca. I was
wondering if there are any unschoolers there. My boy will turn 13 in
a few days and we are looking for kids perhaps between the ages of 12
and 16. He interested in (to name a few) skate boarding, bike riding,
street luging, computers and wants to learn computer animation and
programing, legos, building forts, working with wood, Playstation 2
Also are there any unschooling groups in the area who meet together
on a regular basis?
He is part of Laurel Springs school, a long distance homeschooling
umbrella school, which is located in Ojai. His teacher is in Ventura
and is totally supporting and encouraging his self-directed learning
style. We live up in the foothills of the Seirra Nevada Mountains
now and there are no other homeschoolers up here and not alot to do
socially. My boy (and myself) really need some other association of
those who have the same learning philosophy.
Hoping to hear from someone soon.
Govinda
